title: [Large-Scale] Coding-Based Social Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Course for Individuals Over 40

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Experience with Digital Device Usage
context.additional_context: Social problem-solving coding education conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can design three basic algorithms that solve everyday social problems using block-based programming tools.
Learners can apply logical thinking processes acquired through coding activities to real-world work/life problem-solving.
Learners can conduct peer feedback on coding projects with fellow learners two or more times using online collaboration tools.

resources: Web-Based Block Coding Platform Access Permissions
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
